I would like to know who write the song and when the song has been completed? 很想知道這首歌是誰在什麼時候寫的。感謝主
Wonderful and peaceful song. Very becoming.
Amen

In times of stress, tragedy, loneliness, loss of a loved one, depression and heart-aches that we experience in life brings us closer to HIM. I love the words of the song and sing and play the chords for the ukulele. His love is AMAZING.

This hymn was given to my husband and I yesterday after losing our baby boy at 5 months of pregnancy. The hymn has been with me as I've reflected on what beauty has come of a dire situation already. The Lord knows so many things that we don't see and He knows what we need for us to be drawn closer to Him. Of course I am sad that I've lost my first born but I am reminded and I've experienced that EVERY situation is an opportunity to turn to the Lord and grow in Him. "Let each experience constitute me So Your life I'll display In every way"
This song has brought me such hope in my current situation of trials. There are many questions unanswered but Lord, You are drawing me. I consecrate my life to You Lord Jesus.
Turn my view to see You.

Amen, Lord. Continue to strengthen me in my daily living. I want to stay in Your presence all the time that I could praise You whatever situations I may be in. Turn my view to see You. Lord make me a babe and suckling—always praising. I love You Lord Jesus!

Lord Jesus, You are my only Master whom I follow. Thank You so much for the blessings I enjoy daily. I always desire to consecrate my whole being and loved ones to You. Your being omnipotent I always think of. Continue to preserve me in the church life and dwell in my heart unto eternity.
Oh, Lord Jesus!!!! We love You. How much we need You. You're so great!!!

We need to see the Lord's hand in all the situations we are in. We might be embittered and may not understand, but these are necessary for the breaking of our self. By the Lord's arrangement, one day we will realize that only He is precious and that our eyes should only be set to Him. Once we are dealt with by the Lord, we will realize that all those times, what He desired is for our hearts to be turned back to Him until we become absolute toward Him. May we all have an intimate, sweet, personal, and affectionate relationship with our Lord. May all our experience lead to praises to Him.
Do you have the hymns in Spanish? I love the hymns and I would sing with the brothers in the house meetings. If any of you have it I would be very grateful.
I love this song.:))) There are times in my life....
AMEN! Such a beautiful piece, has always been among my favorite inspirations.
Amen, amen, amen! This song is one of my favorite :) O LORD JESUS!
It's so beautiful it makes me cry.
My dear Lord your so sweet to us, continue to hold me,I know that I'm sinner but you make me worthy!! without you I'm nothing... Ireally like this song
I love You, Lord Jesus! I'll not go out free. Amen.

Amen. There are times in my life, When my heart is embittered.There are questions unanswered, Yet, You're drawing me To enter Into Your blessed sanctuary. And turning my eyes heavenward, The questions of constant inquiry. Are changed to these words,♥♥

Praise the Lord for we have this kind of an amazing song. It really reminds me of my consecration to HIM. Truly that we should not have questions before because everything happens according to HIS purpose. Let's just turn our view to see and hear only HIM so that HIS life will be displayed thru us. I Love You so much Lord Jesus!

I can really relate to the feeling being expressed here through the words. In the beginning it starts with "unanswered questions" and ends with "Lord, though I still don't understand, keep me enjoying You". This is my experience where I find myself asking the Lord why this and that in my prayers, but then the Lord leads me to drink, to enjoy Him, and let everything be handled by Him.

I love this song because I realize that the Lord is using my every situation to perfect me. Though it may seem difficult at the moment, I should be one to say, "Amen Lord, use this situation to make me a living member of the Body of Christ."

I really like this song...because it touches my heart..."Lord make me a babe and suckling always praising, Enjoying Your worth day by day, Let each experience constitute me, So that Your life I'll display in every way". If we enjoy the Lord day by day, we will be constituted by Him!! The moment I sing this song, I can easily turn to my mingled spirit. LORD JESUS!! Make home in our heart!!!
Lord Jesus... I love You Lord.

There are times that we often caught ourselves in a a dilemma and we do not know what to do or which way to take but it is so comforting to know that though our strength and heart faileth He never fails... His arrangement is always the best..."Lord make me a babe and suckling always praising. Enjoying Your worth day by day. Oh! Let each experience constitute me so Your life I'll display in every way. Though I may not understand a thing right now Lord cause me to go on enjoying You that You may gain me fully until I see You face to face. This will be most glorious thing. To behold You face to face is all I ask for. Lord, thank You for loving me and for being my portion...."
I just love this song! In all my situations, "Lord, turn my view to see You"!
This hymn really reminds us that the Lord is our all and also encourages us to love and pursuit the Lord.
This song helps me to turn to the mingled spirit. O what a joy and a refreshing morning just by reading the words, my spirit quickened by Him.
Amen! This hymn is very wonderful.

I really appreciate this hymn. It moves me and draws me into Christ. I always pray unto Him that this may not just only my emotion, but an inward outpouring of the Holy Spirit. Oh Lord Jesus!!! Cause me to love You more. We may all boldly declare how we love the Lord so much. Praise Him for His recovery.

Lord, in Your wisdom You have arranged the environment we are in, though we have a lot of question yet You used those environments to draw us to Yourself. Lord, we love You, we praise You and we worship You. You know what is best for us. Amen, Lord. Amen to Your arrangement.
There are times in my life When my heart is embittered. There are questions unanswered, Yet, You're drawing me To enter Into Your blessed sanctuary And turning my eyes heavenward, The questions of constant inquiry Are changed to these Whom do I have in heaven But You, dear Jehovah. My flesh and my heart Constantly fail, But God's still The strength of my heart and my portion; To Him forever I'll draw near. I've made Jehovah my sweet refuge.

The questions of constant inquiry Are changed to these words,
"Whom do I have in heaven But You, dear Jehovah.
The world today has a lot of mysteries, a lot of doubt and uncertainty. But all we need to do is believe and receive. We need to see Jesus everyday! Brothers and sisters, cast out all doubt, for we worship the Living and True God, and He draws us. O, let us love Him now before it's too late. For whom do we have in heaven, but our God, dear Jehovah!
Psalms 73:25 "Whom do I have in heaven but You?/And besides You there is nothing I desire on earth" O Lord Jesus! Gain us thoroughly for Your economy.
Whom do I have in heaven but You, dear Jehovah. My flesh and my heart constantly fail.. I love You, Lord! You are still the strength of my heart and my portion!
Praise the Lord for this wonderful between You and Your beautiful bride. Lord, make us ready everyday for Your coming back.
Praise the Lord! may the Lord open our eyes to see Jesus only. The Lord is the only answer to the question in our life. May the Lord Jesus live in us every day. He is the I AM. Amen.
May we continue to be a babe and suckling always praising God's worth day by day.
Turn my view to see You. May the Lord turn our view to see Him. His grace is sufficient. He is drawing us. Amen.
There are times in our life, yet, the Lord is drawing us. Praise the Lord! He is drawing us to Him. Brothers, He's drawing us!

PTL! I just want to praise You for my situation! Though my heart constantly fail...You're still drawing me near to You! Lord, here I am the least of all! Use me for Your economy! Lord Jesus I Love You..
It's only in the sanctuary that we will perceive all things. Amen Lord! Draw us to Your blessed sanctuary.

Although my flesh and my heart constantly fail but there is Someone I have, my God! The strength of my heart and my portion. Forever I'll draw near to Him-my SWEET REFUGE. This song really turns me to come near to the Lord. "Lord Jesus I love You."
Lord, make me A babe and suckling always praising you Enjoying Your worth day by day. Lord Let each experience constitute me So Your life I'll display In every way. Amen!
It touches my soul. Also when I hear this song, I remember the young people of Bulacan, I really miss you guys, specially sis herzl and duday=), PRAISE THE LORD }sister nikki

I was upset with the saints the other day and I left the meeting with tears streaming down my face. A brother, who saw what happened, chased after me all the way to bus stop and was literally trying all sorts of tricks to pacify me. It was hilarious - I would never imagine a brother trying to mollify another brother - it reminds me of a boyfriend trying to placate his girlfriend after upsetting her. Even though we never ended up have a heart to heart talk (I jumped onto a bus despite his efforts), I really appreciate his sincerity and his apologetic way of finding out the reasons I got upset...

I just want to seek You each day, Lord. I was touched with the verse "let each experience constitute me so that I may display You in every way". At times, I just cry to the Lord in prayer. Our experience makes us love the Lord even more each day. Thank You Lord for everything, we will never retire from saying "Lord we just love You."

I really enjoy the message of the song, especially the words "Lord, make me a babe and suckling always praising, enjoying Your worth day by day let each experience constitute me so Your life I'll display in every way!"
Oh, Lord Jesus make me a babe and suckling always praising so I can display Your life in every way!!
Turn my view, to see You, how I need to see JESUS!!! Thank You Lord that You just want us to look away unto You! May this be a new and fresh consecration to You, my Lord!
No matter what happens, God is still The strength of my heart and my portion; To Him forever I'll draw near. I've made Jehovah my sweet refuge. So now throughout the years... Oh Lord Jesus!!
Oh Lord Jesus I just love You. How I need to gain more of You. You are my refuge and sanctuary. My flesh and heart constantly fail but You are the strength of my hear and my portion. Lord Jesus!
O how much more we need the Lord!

Who do we really have but Jesus? God is love and we are made in His image, so what every human being wants and needs is love. What every human being is scared of is a love that ends, is a love that is conditional. What I still find hard to get my head around (because it's so hard to understand from a human perspective) is that Jesus loves us, so much, and He will never stop loving us for all eternity no matter what we do. This love is amazing and when the world tries to hurt us we can hide in this love, because with this love what need do we have of the things in the world? How can the world satisfy us when we have the love of God, His grace, His peace? Truly there is no substitute. :)

Even if it is my first time to hear this song, the message speaks it all and you will really like it. This really speaks our experience. "Though I don't understands the ways that You take. Lord, make me a babe and suckling, always praising. Enjoying Your worth day by day.Let each experience constitute me. So Your life I'll display in every way."
Lord Jesus, turn my view to see You. How I need to see You Lord.

Amen! It's really a very subjective hymn. I was saved, nourished, and strengthened by this song. At times when we are about to give up, He's always there to remind us to turn to Him, drawing us to enter into His blessed sanctuary...
Praise the Lord. This song enlightened me...

This is one of my favourite hymns. I learned it while I was in my 4th term of the FTTA in 2005. I think one of the sisters in my class wrote it. It is very experienceable. This is really saving me. Often times we fail, but God is still strengthening us to go on in Him.
Yes, there are questions unanswered, but Lord, You're drawing me to Yourself all the time.

Recently this hymn really nourished and encouraged me. Turn my view to see You. How I need to see Jesus... May the Lord's grace and mercy be with me. No matter what situation it is, I just want to enjoy You!! Turn away unto Jesus!!

Praise the Lord, and grace be with all the saints!! I think this is one of my favorite hymns because it touched me deeply. The New York Young People did a great job in singing this hymn, and ever since then, I've been practicing this on the piano.

turn my view to see You.... make me a babe and suckling always praising.enjoying Your worth day by day. Let each experience constitute me, so Your life i will display in every way. Lord Jesus,i really love You, this is my longing to be like Him in every way through the experiences that i have gone through.making me a babe always praising Him
This hymn s really exhorting to love the Lord Jesus! Supplied and nourished me to go on love the Lord.
Ever since I heard of this song, it touched my heart. I am young and I love the Lord! This is a very wonderful song!

"my flesh and my heart constantly fail, but God's still the strength of my heart and my portion; to Him forever I'll draw near."!
Even when I might not want Him to be, Jesus still is and will always be Lord, my Lord, our Lord! Hallelujah!

OH!!! I'm SOOO thrilled that this hymn is on here now!!! These words have gotten me through some very difficult and painful times. It always makes me cry now every time we sing it because it touches me so deeply. My dear, sweet sister Vanessa! Praise the Lord for what He has done in you that produced this sweet song which has shepherded me so much! ~Chloe
ps. we miss you in Cypress!
I love so much. This song is simply soothing. God really exists.
Praise the Lord!!!! How we need to see Jesus! Enjoy this precious One day by day!
